name: Excerpts from ~The Honey Month~
description:
🐝 NOTE: This Bitsy is very text-heavy! 🐝

Emma Daues presents a ~Bitsy Storybook~ with a selection of 8 sweet tales adapted from The Honey Month by Amal El-Mohtar.

Use the Arrow Keys / WASD to move & interact; bump into the labels to read what's in each jar, then fly into the jars to sample the honey~

✨🐝✨ Featuring the artwork of Alison Notter (Days 1, 7, 17, and 28) and Nel Daues (Days 5, 8, 15, and 23). ✨🐝✨

Jar + spoon picture by Marco Verch on Flickr (CC BY 2.0) and then image-to-bitsied

🐝 Special thanks to: 🐝

  • Adam for Bitsy
  • Mildmojo & Sean for Hacks Hecks
  • Ruin for I-2-B.
  • Ms. El-Mohtar for writing one of my favorite books of all time ❤
